articles.title: Apple AirPods Max Showing Condensation Issues Near Drivers, Some Users Report - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Apple AirPods Max owners are reporting condensation issues in normal use, with water droplets forming inside the headset near the drivers. This is of particular concern owing to the high price of the headphones and the expectations attached to it.
articles.content: Apple AirPods Max users are reporting an issue with condensation, where water droplets are forming under the removable ear pads near the drivers. The high-end headphones, launched only recently and p… [+1995 chars]
